idea-plugin.name: JiBX
idea-plugin.description: Run JiBX binding compiler after the javac compiler has run and provides validation support.
idea-plugin.change-notes:
Usage:
Right-click on your JiBX mapping file and select "Use as JiBX mapping".

Changes:
- [NEW] Support for Diana (EAP) releases. - [NEW] Updated in order to embed JiBX version 1.1.6a - added support for navigation with factory attributes - now dealing with navigation between XML and Java code and handling refactoring - fixed classpath issues
- significantly improved error reporting
- updated to JiBX 1.1.5
- instrumentation of test classes [NEW]
- fixed compilation failure if no bindings were selected.
- added integration between IDEA and the binding compiler errors.
